heading: About Me
description: I am a passionate full-stack developer with a strong foundation in web technologies and a drive to create innovative solutions. I love building things from scratch and understanding the fundamentals of how systems work.
mission: To create robust, scalable applications and continuously improve my technical skills through hands-on projects and learning.
vision: To become a leading developer who builds efficient, user-friendly applications that solve real-world problems.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.description: Building custom web applications and frameworks from scratch, focusing on performance and user experience.

experience.title: Web Developer
experience.description: Developed responsive websites and web applications using modern technologies and best practices.

projects.name: Custom Template Engine Framework
projects.description: Built a complete web framework from scratch to understand fundamental concepts and improve technical knowledge.

projects.name: E-commerce Microservices
projects.description: Developed a practical microservices-based e-commerce application with multiple services.

projects.name: Member Lounge App
projects.description: Created a membership management application with modern UI/UX design.

projects.name: StrataCore (Enterprise Node.js Framework)
projects.description: This is a production-ready Node.js framework built with TypeScript that implements enterprise-level design patterns and provides a robust foundation for building scalable REST APIs. The framework is designed to eliminate boilerplate code, enforce best practices, and provide a consistent development experience across different database drivers.

projects.name: A Personal Finance Management System. REST API
projects.description: The Personal Finance Management System is a web application designed to empower users to manage their financial activities seamlessly. Project Motive To provide users with free financial services while leveraging user data for business insights.

projects.name: SOLID Principles Implementation Practice Project.
projects.description: A hands-on collection of projects applying SOLID principles to real-world scenarios. Focused on building scalable, maintainable systems using TypeScript and key design patterns like Factory, Strategy, and Adapter. Emphasized clean architecture, modular design, and extensibility. Demonstrates a strong grasp of object-oriented design and commitment to writing clean, robust code.

education.description: Continuously learning through online platforms, documentation, and hands-on projects.
